Text: Thanks BUT We are expecting a 600mb 720p version.

@dragonballz:

You are expecting?

A tiny 720p is proper to play only on mini portable devices: smartphones, tablets etc

 A proper Rip 720p has other dimensions !

2hours=aprox. 2Gb depending on what sound stream you put in [AAC, AC3]. 

For a so Tiny one you can use only AAC at a very low bitrate [acceptable for a mini device player with no stereo and not dedicated sound system...but using headphones you'll have an unpleasant surprise !]

Easy ...expectations!

Cheers.
